projects.name: ExamGenie
projects.description: Exam Genie is a learning aid used by teachers to generate bespoke revision materials in a variety of formats specially tailored to their classes scheme of work and ability level.

projects.name: SkillFlash
projects.description: SkillFlash is a full-stack project written in Typescript utilsing the React Native framework. Its backend is powered by MongoDB and Express. SkillFlash is an AI-powered flash cards app which aims to help users prepare for interviews for tech roles, intepretting keywords from job descriptions in prompts to generate bespoke revision material.
